name: Triditext
body:
TridiText, soon to be TridiText.js ========= #Intro this is just the proof of concept of a soon to be a plugin (for jQuery maybe), its at its very early stages, and problably will worth nothing, but it will be done =)

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
